data.text: @rosielarson75 @jeanmwells @NFW22b @CaroleRadziwill @Bethenny Carole's just defending herself. Read this article about Bethenny's lies and attempts to manipulate Carole and it will explain why Carole wants nothing more to do with B #Rhony https://t.co/lG4s39OGKg
@1Crakow I don't know why she surprised
@jeanmwells @janeOprice That's a fact. Next season it will be someone else. Round & round we go.
@janeOprice @jeanmwells Each of them have fought with someone it's a never ending circle.

@janeOprice @jeanmwells ITA Sonja even admits that Beth's treats her friends horribly. Carole wasn't going to take it so she stood up to her. I like Carole much better now that she has found her voice and stopped being Beth's pet. She's much more interesting and entertaining this season #RHONY

@jeanmwells @DarblesM Carole is the 1 who has to be center of attention She’s extremely jealous of Bethenny + she jumps to the new person & can only have 1 friend at a time it seems Her “I’m too cool for school” act is old Carole needs to go & take her ugly clothes & attitude with her Bye 👋🏻 👋🏻

@suzannador20 @jeanmwells Of course they did. That explains why going into the reunion at least one of them was quoted as saying that there won’t be any confrontation or drama because we’re good. And then ...

@armynavymom @jeanmwells ExxxxxActly! I also think Bethenny thought she’d be hob nobbing with old money if she were CR’s bestie. She forgot that she can’t bully Carole, intimidate Carole and manipulate Carole. #shesnotsonja #meangirl

@rosielarson75 @jeanmwells @NFW22b @CaroleRadziwill @Bethenny Wrong. B's self absorbed and she has a history of treating her friends badly. Carole just got tired of Bethenny trashing her. Bethenny got jealous of Carole's friendship with Dorinda and Tinsley so she became angry and manipulative.  Carole then began to distance herself   #RHONY

@jeanmwells What went wrong is that Bethenny got jealous that Carole was no longer  her pet. Bethenny then got mean and aggressive with Carole in an  attempt to make Carole feel that she somehow wronged her. Carole was  rightly offended and distanced herself from that drama queen #RHONY
@jeanmwells Production told them to go at it to keep viewer's interested.
@jeanmwells Carole lives on Carole world. And she has a new bestie now.  FYI Carole, you’re hair looks awful grow it out and  go darker with Carmel high lights! You look 90 yrs old!
